title: Art Page of AlleraRey
content:

= Heyyy.
= I'm [[*user AlleraRey ]] and this is my art page.

@@ @@

= [[size smaller]]Device Used: Formerly it was Samsung Galaxy Note II, now it's Sony Xperia Z.[[/size]] | [[size smaller]]Program Used: Formerly it was the free Autodesk Sketchbook, now it's ibis Paint X.[[/size]]

@@ @@

= The following pixel arts are not mine but since they are about some of my SCPs, and since they also look pretty cool, I wanted to include them in here.
